about_the_game:
Tohka character image song for the Grisaia Phantom Trigger series.
The tracks are available in both MP3 and WAV (high-quality) format.

Clover

　Vocals: Tohka (Voiced by Ayane Sakura)
　Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima (Elements Garden)
　Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

　Bass: Ryutaro Fujinaga (Elements Garden)
　Guitar: Hitoshi Fujima

　All other Instruments & Programming： Hitoshi Fujima

　Mixed by Eiichi Nishizawa
　Directed by Hitoshi Fujima
　Recorded at ARIA studio
　Sound Produced by Elements Garden
　Production Management: Asami Suita (ARIA entertainment)


WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
